description: Deliciously crispy exterior shells encase these smooth curried Maltese treats.
name: Pastizzi with Curried Peas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a nonstick pan and fry the onion, garlic and peas for 5 minutes and remove from the heat.
Once the fried vegetables have cooled slightly, place in a bowl with the rest of the ingredients apart from the pastry.
Roll out the pastry and cut out about 16 circles using a circular glass or cup.
Place a little of the mixture into the centre of the circle, fold up the edges and pinch together tightly.
Place the sealed pastizzis on a baking tray and bake for 20 minutes before serving.
